title: PLS HELP ME
content:
HI,

can someone help me with that font?

THANKS!

 [‹ slightly glyphic sans id](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821132230/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44246 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Jens Lekman curly 60s-inspired script - Julia Script (hand rendered) {Marcelo} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821132230/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44170 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chefe

comments.content:
it must be something from a german annual report and therefore it must be the compatil family:  
the headline is [compatil fact bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821132230/http:/www.linotype.com/de/55404/compatilfact-schriftfamilie.html) and the copy text is [compatil text regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821132230/http:/www.linotype.com/de/55482/compatiltext-schriftfamilie.html).  
german agencies often use this font system because they don’t come up with more appropriate fonts.
